name: Shadow of Legend: Darkness of the Underworld
name_original: Shadow of Legend: Darkness of the Underworld
description:
Shadow of Legend: Darkness of the Underworld is an action-RPG massively multiplayer game developed by SmartCell Technology. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by SmartCell Technology. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Shadow of Legend: Darkness of the Underworld is available on PC.
